For that reason the money that she obtains is earned with greater speed, and in addition, it allows her to organize her time and complete domestic tasks in her home.  At this time she is asking for 1600 Soles (Peruvian currency).  She is very happy with the financial support that she has been given so that she can continue moving forward.  Also, she promises to comply with the repayment deadlines.  With the requested loan she will buy clothing in bulk including polos, shorts, pants, blouses and sheets.

loans.use: To purchase clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is a married mother with four school-going children. They live at their own house that has electricity and piped water. 

Chizi operates a food kiosk business, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge in her business of competition from other food kiosk operators. 

With the loan of Kshs 20,000, she wants to purchase cooking oil, maize flour, wheat flour and rice for resale. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, maize flour, wheat flour and rice for resale.

loans.name: Kirabo Development Group

texts.en:
Josephine is a resident of Bukakala, located on the outskirts of Mpigi. She is a 32-year-old married woman. Josephine has four children and also looks after one orphan.

She started her hair salon business in 2009, to help her take care of her elderly mother in the village and also to pay for her children's school fees.

She wants to buy hair cream and hair weaves for the salon. Josephine's dream is to build a big salon for herself and a nice house for her mother. The challenges she faces are competition and lack of enough capital. She is a hardworking lady, who does not give up until she has achieved what she wants.

loans.use: to buy hair cream and hair weaves.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo, age 46, is married and has been blessed with eight children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For the past six years, she has operated a retail shop business, selling household consumables to local customers. She faces the major challenge of high cost of transportation in her place of operation. 

With the Kshs 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans, maize flour, and soft drinks for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans in order to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans, maize flour, and soft drinks for resale.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is from Kisauni. She is married to a businessman. They have six young children who are in school, so both Mwanajuma and her husband strive to get ahead and provide their children with everything they did not have.

Mwanajuma has a food pantry at the market. Thanks to the good variety she offers, she has been able to establish a good clientele. She is a hardworking individual and says that she wants to continue growing in her current profession. For this reason, she strives to do her best.

Mwanajuma is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of beverages, milk, bread, noodles, rice, vegetables, and other products, so that she can continue offering her customers the variety that they are accustomed to having.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, milk, bread, noodles, rice, vegetables, and other products for resale.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis es un joven de 27 años de edad, vive al lado de sus padres en la cálida y linda ciudad de Guadalupe, la cual se caracteriza también por su agricultura, en especial el cultivo de Arroz, limón, entre otros y también porque tiene una gastronomía variada. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos Luis solo pudo estudiar hasta el nivel primario, pero le hubiera gustado mucho tener una carrera universitaria.

Cada día Luis trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de colchones, el trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, Luis cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy amable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más colchones al por mayor y poder ofrecerlos a sus clientes ya que tiene varios pedidos, así sus ingresos mejoraran y podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Ser un prospero empresario y poder estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Luis is a 27-year-old young man. He lives with his parents in the warm and lovely city of Guadalupe, which is known for its agriculture, in particular the cultivation of rice and lemons, among other things, and also because it has a diverse cuisine. Due to a lack of financial resources, Luis was only able to study through primary school, but he would have liked to have had a university career very much.

Every day Luis works in his small business selling mattresses. He works about 9 hours a day and with the fruit of his labors he supports his parents with their living expenses. Luis believes that he is getting ahead because he is very friendly and above all because he has a great desire to get ahead.

Luis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to the help they have provided he will be able to buy more mattresses wholesale and offer them to his clients, as he has various requests. In this way, his earnings will improve and he will be able to keep striving to make his greatest dream a reality: "To be a prosperous businessman and to be able to study for a university career."

loans.use: to buy merchandise (mattresses wholesale)

loans.name: Binti

texts.en:
Binti is a married woman with five children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity, but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past four years, she has operated a boda boda (motorcycle) transport business, where her potential customers are town dwellers and passersby. She faces the major challenge of seasonality, especially during the rainy season, when it becomes hard to operate her business. Her dream is to purchase another motorcycle in the near future.

With the Kshs 50,000 loan, she wants to service her motorcycle and purchase new spare parts. She decided to join Yehu because of affordable interest rates.

loans.use: to service her motorcycle and purchase new spare parts.

loans.name: Miali

texts.en:
Miali is married and her husband is a farmer. They have four children, all of whom are adults.

Miali has had a grocery store for more than 20 years, thanks to help from her husband. Together they help one another with the family expenses.

She is asking for this loan to buy noodles, flour, cooking oil, cookies, cassava and drinks, among other things, to stock her store so that she can offer a greater variety to her customers and be able to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy noodles, flour, cooking oil, cookies, cassava and drinks among other things, to stock her store.

loans.name: Felecia

texts.en:
Felecia is 29 years old and lives and works in Buchanan, the capital City of Grand Bassa County, located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, cassava-based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. Felecia lives there with her husband and two children ages 10 and 5 years old. Her children go to school. Felecia completed grade 12, and she has been running a cook shop (restaurant) for the past seven years in the local market. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more food ingredients, such as pepper, rice, fish, oil, etc., for her business. She likes her business because it helps her to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.  

She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advance for their help.

loans.use: to purchase more food ingredients, such as pepper, rice, fish, oil, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is married and has one school-going child. They live at their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She has operated a fruit and vegetable stall business for the past two years. She sells from home to her neighbors. She dreams of establishing a mini green grocery in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000 loan, she wants to purchase sacks of fruits and vegetables for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get financial supports

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Biasha

texts.en:
Biasha is from Likoni and has three children who attend school. Biasha has a stall in town, where she sells fruit juice and coconuts. 

Thanks to her work, she is able to help her children finish their studies and pay for all the household needs. She is a dedicated person who has demonstrated that she works hard to meet her obligations.

She is asking for this loan to buy raw materials to produce fruit juice, and also vegetables, so that she can continue working to meet her goals.

loans.use: to buy raw materials in order to produce fruit juice, and also to purchase vegetables.

loans.name: Llermi

texts.es: Llermi tiene 19 años de edad , es madre soltera y vive en la casa de sus padres en compañía de su abuela, su hermana y su pequeño hijo.Llermi se dedica a la ganadería y desde muy temprano se dirige a la tierra de sus padres a extraer la leche de su ganado , para luego venderlos a la planta que se encuentra en las afueras de su ciudad. Como una actividad complementaria brinda servicios de vulcanizado ya que su padre tiene un taller en donde se dedican a está actividad. Con las ganancias que obtiene de la venta de leche da una buena calidad de vida a su menor hijo, además espera crecer, progresar y seguir adelante con su negocio para tener mayores ingresos económicos.Esta es su primer crédito con Kiva, y esta muy agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para continuar con su negocio.En está oportunidad solicitara S/.1000 soles el cual cual comprará un Toro para así aumentar su ganado.
texts.en:
Llermi, 19, is a single mother.  She lives in her parents' house with her grandmother, her sister, and her young child.

Llermi makes a living in livestock.  She goes out to her parents' land very early to milk the cows.  Later she sells it at the plant on the outskirts of her city.  As a supplementary activity she offers repair services because her father has a shop where he makes a living in this line of work.

With her profits from selling milk she gives her young child a good quality of life.  She also hopes to grow, progress, and get ahead with her business and have more income.

This is her first Kiva loan and she's very grateful for the financial support to continue with her business.  Currently she'll request 1000 soles [PEN] to buy a bull to increase her cattle.

loans.use: to buy a bull

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice is 32 years old. She sells different items in her retail business. She has spent six years running the business and it has benefited her life as well as that of her family. She has requested a loan to buy more cooking oil, rice, and potatoes for resale. The profits from the business will be used for savings.

loans.use: To buy more food for resale at her restaurant.

loans.name: Edita Del Socorro

texts.es:
Edita, una mujer muy trabajadora con muchos deseos de salir adelante, dice que el beneficio con el crédito anterior le ha traído cambios muy buenos para su negocio ya que ha comprado materia prima para trabajar y producir más. Agradece mucho el apoyo que ha obtenido atravez de los créditos que le han brindado.
Ahora desea hacer nuevos estilos de ropa y atraer más clientes sobre todo en los atuendos bordados a mano, pues ella considera que es importante ofrecer calidad y variedad para competir en el mercado y así mantener y mejoras sus ingresos. Hoy está requiriendo el crédito para comprar telas, hilos, lanas, encajes, botones  y elásticos.
texts.en:
Edita is a very hardworking woman who has a strong desire to get ahead.  She says her previous loan brought very beneficial changes to her business, because she was able to buy raw materials so that she could work and produce more.  She is very grateful for the support that she has received through  these loans.

Now Edita wants to make new styles of clothing, particularly hand-embroidered garments, so that she can attract more customers.  She thinks that the most important thing is to offer quality and variety to compete in the marketplace so that she can maintain and improve her income.  She needs a loan now to buy fabric, thread, yarn, lace, buttons and elastic.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, yarn, lace, buttons and elastic

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive con su compañera de vida en casa de un familiar, se dedica a ser agricultor siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son, maíz y frijol. El cliente desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: The client lives with his life partner in the house of a relative. He makes a living as a farmer, sowing the primary basic grains of the area every year, such as corn and beans. The client desires to increase his sales and therefore he visited the offices of INTEGRAL to ask for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, among other things. He hopes to have the help requested because he does not have any other monetary income. In this way he will keep bringing home the daily bread without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, among other things.

loans.name: Milton Elenilson

texts.es: Milton vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 12 y 3 años, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace varios años, sus cosechas las comercializa en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, Milton esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. para poder obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Milton lives in his own house with his wife and his two children, aged 12 and 3.  He is a farmer who's been cultivating corn and beans for a number of years.  He sells his harvested crops to agents who buy and sell these staple goods.  With the profits he obtains from his sales, he manages to cover the household expenses.  Milton is requesting a loan so that he can buy seeds, organic and chemical fertilizers, herbicides, and other agricultural supplies.  This way, he can obtain better earnings and give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, organic and chemical fertilizers, herbicides, and other agricultural supplies

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive con su compañera de vida en cas propia el se dedica  a la agricultura desde hace 3 años su principal siembra es maíz y frijol cuando ya ha pasado la cosecha trabaja de jornal en una finca cerca de su casa. El cliente desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: The client lives with his life partner in a house they own. He makes a living from agriculture. For the last 3 years, his primary crops have been corn and beans. Once the harvest has passed, he does daily work on an estate near his house. The client wants to increase his sales and therefore he visited the offices of INTEGRAL to ask for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, among other things. He hopes to have the help requested as he does not have any other monetary income. In this way he will keep bringing home the daily bread without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Nelson Herney

texts.es:
Nelson tiene 30 años de edad y se dedica a la construcción de techos. Inició con en el ejercicio de la activad como ayudante desde hace 13 años, tiempo que le permitió adquirir experiencia, perfeccionar la técnica e independizarse. En la actualidad genera cuatro empleos, debido a que por su calidad de en el servicio es solicitado frecuentemente. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una motosierra y una pulidora con el fin de contar con mejores herramientas y continuar con la calidad en el servicio.
Tiene una hija de tres años de edad la cual es el motor que lo impulsa cada día a buscar mejores condiciones de vida y garantizarle un adecuado desarrollo.
texts.en:
Nelson, 30, is a roofer.  He started out in this line of work as an assistant 13 years ago.  Over time, he acquired experience and became technically proficient, so that he was able to start working independently.  He now has 4 employees, because due to the quality of his work he is in demand. 

Nelson is requesting a loan to invest in a chainsaw and a sanding machine.  With better tools, he can continue to provide good quality service. 

Nelson has a 3 year-old daughter who is the motor that drives him each day to seek better living conditions, so that he can ensure her proper development.

loans.use: to buy a chainsaw and a sanding machine

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de más capital de trabajo y por la buena atención que  la Institución  brinda, este le permitirá comprar insumos necesarios para los tamales y productos para la tienda tales como: azúcar, frijoles, arroz, entre otros, ya que hoy en dia tiene este otro negocio. 
El crédito anterior le ayudo a crecer el negocio, ya que han mejorado las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares.
texts.en: María is asking for a loan because she needs more capital and because she believes in the Kiva field partner.  The loan will help her to buy the ingredients necessary for tamales and products for her store such as: sugar, beans, rice, and other items, since now she has this other business. The previous credit helped her to grow her business, since it has improved her economic condition and the circumstances of her family.

loans.use: To buy necessary items like tamales, sugar, beans, rice and other items.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia de 33 años de edad, ha dedicado la mayor parte de su tiempo  a velar por el bienestar de sus dos hijos y administrar su  tienda en la que comercializa productos de la canasta familiar. Gracias a su actividad genera los recursos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 
Con el fin de incrementar las ventas y diversificar sus productos, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un congelador para el almacenamiento de carnes frías.
Asegura que con dicha inversión podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y cumplirá su gran sueño de tener vivienda propia.
texts.en: Patricia is 33 years old and has dedicated most of her time to caring for her children and administering her store in which she sells common household items.  Thanks to her work she generates the income necessary to support her family.  With the aim of increasing her sales and diversifying her products, she is asking for a loan in order to invest in the purchase of a freezer for the storage of fresh meat.  She assures us that this investment will improve her quality of life and help her with her greatest dream, that of owning her own home.

loans.use: To buy a freezer.

loans.name: Yuliana Elena

texts.es:
Yuliana es una joven de 24 años de edad, emprendedora y con muchos deseos de iniciar con su carrera profesional. Su condición económica se ha convertido en su mayor limitante, por lo cual desde hace algunos meses decidió dedicarse a la venta de comidas rápidas y pagarse sus estudios. Con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos, Yuliana  se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido y adecuaciones locativas. 
Su mayor sueño es tener un empleo estable y garantizarle a su madre una vida digna sin carencias económicas.
texts.en:
Yuliana is a 24 year-old young woman who is enterprising and has a strong desire to start working toward a professional degree.  Her financial situation is her main impediment, and so some months ago she decided to start selling fast food so that she could pay for her education.  In order to increase her income, Yuliana is requesting a loan to invest in supplies and equipment for her business.

Yuliana's main dream is to have a stable job so that she can ensure that her mother can have a decent life free of economic hardship.

loans.use: to buy staple food products for her fast food business

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Margarita tiene 61 años de edad, pero tiene la alegría y las ganas de luchar de una joven de 20 años, Margarita vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ubicada en la costa sur del Perú y se caracteriza por su clima cálido sus hermosas playas y su gastronomía a base de pescados y mariscos.  Margarita vive al lado de su esposo y juntos tiene 2 hijos, los cuales ya son mayores pero a quienes quiere muchísimo. Margarita no pudo tener una carrera universitaria ya que sus padres tenían pocos recursos pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser chef ya que ella cocina muy rico.

Día a día Margarita trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de verduras, con cuyos ingresos la ayudan para apoyar a  su esposo con los gastos del hogar, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo no se deja vencer por las adversidades.

Margarita está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un local para su negocio, ya que actualmente no lo tiene, de esta manera ya no pagara alquiler y podrá mejorar sus ingresos y así seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Margarita is 61 years old, but she has the cheerfulness and tenacity of a 20 year-old.  Margarita lives in the city of Pisco, located on the southern coast of Peru.  This is a place that is known for its warm climate, beautiful beaches, and cuisine based on fish and seafood.  Margarita lives with her husband, and together they have 2 children who are adults, but whom they love very much.  Margarita was not able to study at a university, because her parents had a low income, but she would have liked to have studied to become a chef because she cooks very well.

Each day, Margarita works in her small business selling vegetables.  With the income she earns, she helps her husband with the household expenses.  Margarita works about 8 hours a day, and she is able to tend to about 15 customers per day.  She believes that she is getting ahead because she is friendly with her customers, and most of all, she does not give up even when faced with adversity.

Margarita is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the support that they have provided, she will be able to buy a stall for her business, which she currently does not have.  This way she will not have to pay rent, so she will be able to increase her income and continue to strive to make her greatest dream a reality:  to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy her own stall for her business

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Judith, de 38 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, dinámica y deseosa de progresar. Está casada con Ermes quien es empleado y padre de sus 5 hijos. Vive cómodamente en compañía de su esposo y sus hijos en su casa propia.La actividad que realiza Judith es la confección y costura de prendas de vestir , asimismo elabora estas prendas de acuerdo al gusto de sus clientes tanto para damas, caballeros y niños.Comenzó a trabajar solo con una maquina de coser el cual fue adquirido con el apoyo de su familia. Lleva cumpliendo esta actividad hace 11 años y trabaja sola.Le gusta su labor porque le permite contar con el dinero que necesita para solventar los gastos de su hogar, y a su vez apoyar a su esposo. Tiene planeado implementar un modesto taller con máquinas de mejor calidad.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800 soles, por tanto agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para acceder al crédito que necesita para continuar con el logro de sus metas. Se compromete a ser un cliente puntual y muy responsable con el pago de sus cuotas.
El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de telas, hilos, elásticos y demás accesorios de confección.
texts.en:
Judith is 38 years old. She is a hard working, dynamic woman with a desire to progress. She is married to Ermes, who is employed and who is the father of her 5 children. They live together comfortably in a house they own. Judith works making and sewing dresses. She makes the garments according to the preference of her customers, ladies, gentlemen and children.
Judith started to work with only a sewing machine bought with the support of her family. She has been doing this for 11 years and works on her own. She enjoys her job because it allows her to have the money to pay for the household expenses and also support her husband.
Judith is planning to put in place a small workshop with better quality sewing machines. On this occasion, she is asking for 800 nuevos soles. She is grateful for the opportunity to get the loan she needs to continue to fulfill her goals. 
Judith promises to be a punctual customer and to be very responsible with the repayment installments. She will invest the money from the loan in the purchase of fabric, thread, elastic bands and other dressmaking items.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, elastic bands and other dressmaking items.

loans.name: Elgiba

texts.es:
Elgiba, de 62 años de edad, es madre soltera de 6 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad aunque actualmente vive en su casa propia solo con su ultima hija y su pequeño nieto.Elgiba se dedica a la venta de bebidas heladas como gaseosas, agua envasada y cerveza. Distribuye diariamente sus productos entre sus vecinos y ocasionales clientes.Lleva realizando este trabajo desde hace 20 años y le va muy bien ademas trabaja con la ayuda de su hija.Le gusta mucho trabajar de esta manera ya que le permite disponer de su tiempo libre y dedicárselo a su nieto a quien quiere mucho por eso desea brindarle lo mejor.En esta oportunidad solicitará 
S/. 3800 soles y está muy contenta de recibir un apoyo financiero que le permita seguir con su negocio, además se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Con el monto solicitado comprará progresivamente más bebidas tales como gaseosas, cervezas y agua envasada para que continúe con su labor.
texts.en: Elgiba is a 62-year-old single mother with six children, all of whom are grown up. She currently lives in her own home with her youngest daughter and her little grandson. Elgiba makes a living selling cold beverages like soft drinks, bottled water and beer. She distributes her products daily among her neighbors and occasional customers. She has been doing this job for the past 20 years, and it is going very well. On top of that, she works with the help of her daughter. Elgiba really enjoys working this way because it gives her free time to spend with her grandson, whom she loves so much and for whom she wants to provide the best. She is requesting a loan and is very pleased to receive the financial support that will allow her to continue with her business. Furthermore, she promises to make her payments on time. With the loan, she will progressively purchase more beverages, such as soft drinks, beer and bottled water, so she can continue with her work.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, such as soft drinks, bottled water and other items.

loans.name: Modesto

texts.es: El Sr. Modesto tiene 49 años, se dedica a la agricultura sembrando papa y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de Porvenir,  este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución,  El Sr. Modesto va a utilizar  este préstamo para la siembra de arroz  y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, El Sr. Modesto enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios para mejorara la calidad de vida del cliente, es una persona  responsable y trabajador se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado, ya que esta es su única actividad.
texts.en: Modesto is 49 years old and makes a living farming potatoes and corn on his parcel of land in the community of Porvenir. This is his third loan with Kiva partner Emprender, and Modesto plans to use it to plant rice and prepare his land. His reason for requesting the loan is to have resources for the planting and for subsistence. Modesto faces challenges with his business, such as inclement weather that often times ruins crops, and he plans to use his profits to improve his quality of life. He is a responsible and hardworking person who feels grateful for the support Emprender is providing, since this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to plant rice and prepare the land.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José es un campesino de 45 años de edad, radicado en la vereda el Guamito del municipio de la Ceja, Colombia. Desde los nueve años aprendió sobre la actividad de la agricultura y la ganadería. Trabajó por varios años como mayordomo, hasta que tomó la decisión de independizarse. En la actualidad se dedica a la lechería, la cual se ha convertido es su actividad económica. Sueña con garantizarle a su familia, especialmente a sus dos hijos el acceso a la educación superior, Razón que lo ha motivado a solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una vaca lechera para aumentar su producción y alcanzar sus sueños.
texts.en:
José, 45, is a farmer who lives in the El Guamito community in the town of La Ceja, Colombia.  He learned about agriculture and ranching from the age of nine.  He worked for several years as a foreman until he decided to work on his own.  Currently he makes a living in dairy, which has become his economic activity.

He dreams of guaranteeing his family access to a college education, especially his two children.

This has motivated him to request a loan to invest in buying a dairy cow to increase his production and realize his dreams.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Rosa Marina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa, está casada y vive con sus tres hijos, todos dependen de su negocio. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, el oficio lo aprendió de su familia y lo realiza desde hace 20 años de 7:00am a 5:00pm, no presenta dificultades para hacerlo.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar manzanas, sandia, naranjas, uvas, plátanos, tomates, chiles, entre otros; esta inversión le ayudara a obtener mayores ganancias, crecer en el negocio.
Su sueño es ampliar el negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Rosa is married and lives with her three children, and everyone depends on her business. She makes a living selling fruits and vegetables. She learned the trade from her family and has been doing it for 20 years, working from 7 a.m. until 5 p.m. The job is not difficult to do. She is requesting the loan to purchase apples, watermelons, oranges, grapes, bananas, tomatoes, peppers and other items. This investment will help her earn more income and grow her business. Her dream is to expand her business and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase apples, watermelons, oranges, grapes, bananas, tomatoes, peppers and other items.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo, requiere de un nuevo préstamo porque necesita mas capital de trabajo; este le permitirá comprar los insumos necesarios tales como: abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas, pesticidas, semilla y para la preparación de la tierra.
Las condiciones economicas han mejorado y las circunstancias familiares se han optimizado
texts.en:
Ricardo is requesting a new loan because he needs more working capital; this will allow him to buy necessary supplies, such as: fertilizer, herbicide, insecticide, pesticide, and seeds, and to prepare his land. 

His economic conditions have gotten better and his family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides, pesticides, and seeds, and to prepare his land.

loans.name: Antonio Fernando

texts.es:
Antonio es un hombre de 59 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, Antonio no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios y eso lo imposibilito a estudiar una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar una riquísima Sopa de Leche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Antonio trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de plátanos, el trabaja todos los días por un pequeño mercadillo de su ciudad y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Antonio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, como madera, clavos, calaminas, pintura y otros, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder mejorar su vivienda, de esta manera el y su familia tendrán mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues Antonio seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su negocio de venta de abarrotes.
texts.en: Antonio is 59 years old and lives in the city of Pucallpa with his wife and their three children, whom he lives and are his principal reason for living. He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person, who along with his wife dedicates all of his efforts to make headway for his family. Sadly, because of a lack of economic resources and a need to work from a very young age to help his parents, Antonio was not able to finish elementary school, making it impossible to pursue a professional degree. In his free time he likes to cook a rich Sopa de Leche (a traditional dish) to share with his family. On his own initiative and with a lot of hard work and dedication, Antonio works in his small business selling bananas. He works every day at a small market in the city for approximately eight hours, he enjoys doing his job and believes it is going well thanks to the good prices and the friendly way he treats others. Antonio is very grateful for Kiva lenders, since thanks to your help he will be able to purchase construction materials like wood, nails, corrugated iron, paint and other supplies that will help him out a lot in making improvements to his home. In this way, he and his family will have more safety and comfort and Antonio will continue working hard to achieve his biggest dream of having a grocery store business.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Jessi

texts.es: Jessi, de 34 años de edad, es una mujer amable y buena,está casada con Marcial y junto a él tiene 3 hijos de 16, 9 y 3 años de edad respectivamente, tiene su casa propia sin embargo ahora vive en la casa de su suegra.El trabajo de Jessi consiste en la venta de frutas y verduras regionales tales como plátanos, yuca, cocona, limones y otros. Cada producto lo vende en mayor cantidad dependiendo de su temporada de producción ya que alguno de ellos puede escasear en ciertos meses o en caso contrario pueden abundar. Tiene un puesto de ventas en uno de los principales mercados de la ciudad. Lleva trabajando en esta actividad cerca de 5 años y desde que empezó lo ha hecho sola ademas que le gusta mucho su forma de trabajo ya que se siente libre e independiente, a su vez gana muy bien y eso le permite estar mas tranquila, su meta principal es expandir su negocio y empezar a vender en otras ciudades ya que afirma que de esa forma sus ingresos económicos aumentarán considerablemente.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500 soles y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que le brindad para continuar con su negocio y así cumplir todas sus metas.Con el monto solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de plátanos , mandarinas y naranjas para que continúe trabajando.
texts.en:
Jessi is 34 years old; she is a good and friendly woman. She is married to Marcial, and together with him, she has 3 children ages 16, 9, and 3 years respectively. She has her own house; however, at this time, she lives in her mother-in-law’s house. 

Jessi works selling native fruits and vegetables, such as plantains, yucca, cocona fruit, lemons, and others. She sells each product in greater quantities depending on its production season, since some of them are in short supply in certain months, or in the opposite case, they are plentiful. 

She has a sales stall in one of the main markets in the city. She has been doing this work for 5 years, and she has been doing it by herself since she started. In addition, she really enjoys her work because she feels free and independent. At the same time, it’s going very well for her, and this helps her to feel calmer. 

Her main goal is to expand her business and to begin making sales in other cities. She says that in this way, her economic earnings will increase considerably. 

With this opportunity, she is requesting 1500 soles; she feels grateful for the financial support that she has been offered to continue with her business and in this way reach all of her goals. With the requested loan, she will purchase a greater quantity of plantains, tangerines, and oranges in order to continue working.

loans.use: to purchase products like plantains, oranges, and tangerines, among others.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
This is Martha from Liberia. She resides in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa county.  The county is located by the sea and is known for its beaches and fish. In addition, many logging companies are also located in the city.  People in Buchanan are known in the country for their love of fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. 

Martha is 32 and single, with three children.  Her children are between the ages of 14 and 2. They all are currently living at home and only two are in school.  

Martha has owned her own small local shop selling slippers and lappa (traditional cloth) for the past 10 years. She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more goods. 

On average, she works 10 hours at her business from Monday to Saturday. She started her business with a little money from her fiance. She transports her merchandise by shared taxi. She cites the rainy season as her biggest challenge. Her favorite part of her business is controlling her own money. In the future, she would like to build a modern shop.  

She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more goods.

loans.name: Lorpu

texts.en:
This is Lorpu from Liberia. She resides in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa county. The county is located by the sea and is known for their beaches and fish.  In addition, many logging companies are also located in the city.  People in Buchanan are known in the country for their love of fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.
 
She is 50 and married with three children. Her children are between the ages of 30 and 17 years old. Only one of her children is currently living at home and in school.
  
Lorpu has owned her own table business selling pepper, salt, vita, oil etc for the past 20 years.  She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more goods. On average, she works 10 hours at her business from Monday to Saturday.  She started her business with a little money from her husband. She transports her merchandise by shared taxi.  She cites the rainy season as her biggest challenge.  Her favorite part of her business is the profit making.  In the future, she would like to build a modern shop. She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
Armando es un hombre de 33 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Armando pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Mecánica que deseaba, lamentablemente no ha podido ejercer su profesión, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear con su familia por las calurosas y acogedoras calles de su ciudad.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Armando trabaja como vigilante brindando servicios de seguridad en una empresa service de su ciudad, adicionalmente los fines de semana trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, brindando servicios de transporte, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Armando se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de mano de obra y materiales, como calaminas, clavos, listones y otros, ya que desea mejorar el techado de su vivienda, de esta manera Armando y su familia tendrá mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a su pequeño convertido en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Armando is 33 years old and lives with in the city of Pucallpa with his wife and young son.  He loves his son and he is Armando's main reason for living.  Armando is friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic and, together with his wife, they put in all their efforts to helping their family move forward.  Thanks to his efforts, Armando was able to study mechanics but, unfortunately, was not able to enter the profession.  In his free time, Armando likes to go out with his family, into the city's warm and welcoming streets.

Through his own initiative, and with a lot of determination and dedication, Armando works as a security guard in his city.  Additionally, at the weekend, he works as a mototaxi driver.  He works every day for around twelve hours and he thinks things are going well for him because he treats others well.

Armando is very grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to the help provided, he will be able to cover labour costs and to buy material, such as corrugated iron, nails and roof slats. Armando wants to improve the roof on his home as, then, he and his family will be safer and better protected from the elements.  Armando will be able to continue working and putting in the effort to achieve his great dream of seeing his young son one day become a professional.

loans.use: to improve the roof on his home.

loans.name: Korto

texts.en:
This is Korto from Liberia. She resides in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County. The county is located by the sea and is known for their beaches and fish.  In addition, many logging companies are also located in the city.  People in Buchanan are known in the country for their love of fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.
 
She is 34 and married with two children, ages 10 and 1. They are both living at home but only one is in school. Korto has owned her own small local shop business selling soap, flour, sugar, rice, etc for the past 10 years.  She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more goods.  On average, she works 12 hours at her business from Monday to Saturday.  She started her business with a little money from her husband. She transports her merchandise by shared taxi.  She cites the rainy season as her biggest challenge.  Her favorite part of her business is the profit.  In the future, she would like to build a modern house. She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell

loans.name: Edwin Jose

texts.es:
Edwin, habita en la ciudad de Estelí , tiene una pequeña hija de dos años, él se dedica a vender fritanga y  por las tarde vende elotes. Él no le da pena lo que hace, lo importante es el trabajo digno con el cual pueda llevar el sustento a su hogar el empezó en este negocio al verse en la necesidad de  conseguir ingresos. Trabaja desde su  adolescencia le gusto trabajar duro para comprarse sus cosas. Sus planes futuros son contratar dos jóvenes más para que salga en triciclos a vender.
 	Está requiriendo el crédito  para comprar un triciclo para aumentar sus ventas y materia prima como arroz, aceite, frijoles, queso, bolsas condimentos  para hacer comidas .   
 	Don Edwin cree dice que este crédito le va ayudar mucho porque tendrá otra manera de llevar sus productos a los clientes y eso lo hace sentir feliz el mercado en Estelí es grande y cree que teniendo más vendedores podrá atender más zonas y conseguir nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
Edwin lives in the city of Estelí and has a two-year-old daughter.  He makes a living making fried foods and, in the afternoon, sells corn on the cob. Edwin has no problem doing this work as the most important thing is to have a decent job so that he can bring home an income.  Edwin started this work when he realised he needed to bring in an income.  He has been working since he was a teenager and enjoys working as it means he can buy things.  Edwin's plan for the future is to hire two young people to go out on tricycles to sell as well.

Edwin needs this loan to buy a tricycle to increase his sales and to buy basic supplies such as rice, oil, beans and bags for condiments, to make the food.

Edwin thinks that this loan will help him a lot a having a tricycle will help him take his products out to customers.  This makes him feel glad as the Estelí market is very large and, with more sellers working there, he will be able to get further and find new customers.

loans.use: to buy a tricycle to increase his sales and to buy basic supplies such as rice, oil, beans and bags for condiments, to make the food.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is a Liberian. She resides in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County.  The county is located by the sea and is known for their beaches and fish.  In addition, many logging companies are located in the city. People in Buchanan are known in the country for their love of fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.
 
She is 28 and single with a three-year-old child who is currently living at home and attending school. Emma has owned her own small local shop business selling rice for the past two years.  She will use the loan proceeds to purchase more goods. On average, she works eight hours at her business from Monday to Saturday.  She started her business with a little money from her fiance. She transports her merchandise by shared taxi.  She cites the rainy season as her biggest challenge.  Her favorite part of her business is the money she makes.  In the future, she would like to build a house.  She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Diana, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora,está casada con René y junto a él tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 3 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia.Diana se dedica a la crianza de pollos razón por la cual acondicionó un espacio en la huerta de su hogar para así realizar esta actividad sin problemas, lleva 5 años cumpliendo esta labor y ha ido aprendiendo a desarrollar mejor esta función.Trabaja siempre sola ya que su esposo se dedica a otras actividades laborales.Le gusta su trabajo ya que le permite cumplir otras funciones en su hogar como atender a sus hijos ya que siempre tiene el tiempo suficiente para cumplir su labor de madre, gracias a este trabajo su situación financiera es estable y rentable además se encuentra muy optimista y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 3800 soles y está muy agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante con su negocio.Con el monto solicitado comprará vitaminas y alimentos balanceados para sus pollos.
texts.en: Diana, thirty years old, is an enterprising woman.  She is married to René and, with him, has two children, aged seven and three years old.  They all live together in their privately owned house.  Diana makes a living raising chickens and has a space out in the garden set up exactly for this work.  She has been doing this for five years, during which time she has learned to improve her working ways.  Diana always works alone as her husband does other work.  She likes her job as it allows her to get other things done too, such as looking after her children.  She always has the time to do things for the children.  Thanks to this work, Diana has stable finances and is making a profit.  She is very optimistic and has a great desire to move forward in life.  On this occasion she is applying for 3800 Nuevo Soles and is very grateful for the support being provided as, with it, she will be able to prosper with her business.  Diana will buy vitamins and feed for chickens with this loan.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and feed for chickens.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es:
Fidel, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque quiere iniciar una nueva cosecha; este le permitirá comprar abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, semilla de maíz.
El crédito anterior fue de mucha ayuda, ya que logro adquirir una planta para regadillo; las condiciones económicas han cambiado y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Fidel is in need of a new loan so that he can start a new cycle of crops - the loan will enable him to purchase fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides and corn seeds.

The previous loan was very helpful to him as he was able to acquire crops to irrigate. His economic situation has since changed and his family's circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides and corn seeds.

loans.name: Sindoe

texts.en:
Please meet 38-year-old Sindoe from Buchanan. Buchanan is the capital city of Grand Bassa County and is located by the sea.  It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish.  Many logging companies are based in the city.  Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce.  Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. 

Sindoe did not go to school and is married.  She describes herself as a hard working woman. Her spouse works as a security man.  They have four children between 20 and 11 years old. Only two are of her children are in school and live at home. 

Sindoe has a table business where she sells rice, salt, pepper, etc.  She has been in business for five years and works from Monday to Saturday spending 10 hours per day.  With this loan, she will buy inventory.  One of the greatest challenges that she faces is less income.  She transports her goods by shared taxi.  She started her business with money from her husband.  She is proud of her business because of the profit she makes. Her future plan is to build a house.  She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell.

loans.name: Deldina

texts.es: Deldina, de 39 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos por quienes se esfuerza diariamente para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida , todos viven juntos en su casa propia.El negocio que tiene Deldina es la venta de suplementos nutricionales elaborados a base de productos naturales que ayudan a combatir el estrés, el cansancio, algunas enfermedades neurológicas y otros. Empezó a desarrollar este trabajo desde hace 1 año gracias a la recomendación de una amiga. Vende sus productos de manera ambulatoria ya sea en cajas a precios al por mayor o por unidad en sobre pequeños siendo su principal clientela sus amigos, familiares y compañeros de trabajo. Sus ventas las realiza al contado o al crédito.Le gusta su actividad pues le ha traído muchas satisfacciones como el ayudar a muchas personas con el cuidado de su salud principalmente a su madre quien se encontraba muy enferma, ella le brindó un tratamiento personalizado y ahora la salud de su progenitora ha mejorado. Gracias a su trabajo se siente una micro empresaria que cada día va progresando. Al contrario le incomoda cuando alguno de sus clientes se retrasa en el pago de sus créditos, pero aun así desea continuar y seguir adelante.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800, está agradecida y contenta al saber que sigue contando con el apoyo financiero que necesita para avanzar con el progreso de su negocio. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de mayor cantidad de cajas de Suplementos Nutricionales.
texts.en: Deldina is 39 years old.  She is a single mother to her two children, for whom she puts in a lot of effort every day in order to provide them with a better quality of life.  The three members of the family all live together in their own home.  Deldina has a business selling nutritional supplements that are made with natural products.  They help to fight against stress, tiredness and some neurological problems, among others.  Deldina started this work a year ago following a recommendation from a friend.  She works as a street vendor, selling in bulk for a lower price or selling individual sachets.  Her main customers are her friends, family and colleagues.  She sells on credit or in cash.  Deldina likes her work as it brings her a lot of satisfaction to help others look after their health.  Particularly, her mother was very ill but with personalised treatment she is now better.  Thanks to her work, Deldina feels like she is progressing every day.  She does not like when one of her customers is late in making their payments but she still wants to continue with the work and move forward.  On this occasion, Deldina is applying for 800 Nuevo Soles. She is grateful is happy to know that she has the financial support that she needs in order for her business to progress.  Deldina will use the loan to buy the nutritional supplements in bulk.

loans.use: to buy nutritional supplements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a zero grazing unit.

loans.name: Nilton Elvis

texts.es:
Nilton es un hombre de 24 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Nilton pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Picadillo de Paiche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Nilton trabaja como asistente contable en una empresa aceitera de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Nilton se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una laptop, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder avanzar sus trabajos y labores pendientes en su hogar, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia empresa.
texts.en:
24-year-old Nilton is single and lives in the city of Pucallpa with his parents and siblings. He is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic young man, who has a great desire to excel in life. Thanks to his own effort and the support of his parents, Nilton was able to study for a career in Accounting. In his spare time he enjoys playing soccer with his friends and sometimes cooks a delicious Peruvian fish dish called 'Picadillo de Paiche' to share with his family.

On his own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Nilton secured a job as an Assistant Accountant in an oil company in his city. He works around 10 hours each day, and believes that his success is due to his good performance and the kind treatment he provides to others.

Nilton is grateful to Kiva lenders. Thanks to their assistance he will be able to purchase a laptop, which will greatly help him to improve his daily work and enable him to work at home. He will be able to continue in his work and strive to achieve his dream of owning his own business.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop computer

loans.name: Marvin Boanerges

texts.es:
Marvin es un señor soltero de 29 años quien tiene 1 hijo, quienes viven en Sololá.
El se dedica  desde hace 1 año a la compraventa de ropa americana en el mercado local de Sololá. Eligio esta actividad porque es un producto  que  contribuye a la economía de las personas de escasos recursos, ya que atreves de la labor que realiza, le genera ingresos y ganancias aceptables para solventar los gastos familiares.
El está solicitando un préstamo de Q 8,000.00  para la  compra de ropa americana.
Su sueño es remodelar su vivienda para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Marvin is 29 year old man who is not married. He has 1 child; they live in Sololá.

He has been in business for 1 year, trading in American style clothes at the local market in Sololá. He chose this activity because it is a product that contributes to the economic wellbeing of people with few resources, as it is through his own efforts that he generates income and enough earnings to cover his household expenses.

He is requesting a loan of Q 8,000.00 to purchase American-style clothes.

His dream is to renovate his house in order to be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy American-style clothes

loans.name: Beatric

texts.en:
Beatric is 34 years old and lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County which is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. She lives with her seven children who are between the ages of 18 and 2, only five of them are in school. She is single, and did not go to school. She has been selling slippers, blouses, trousers, etc. for the past 10 years at the local market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more goods for her business. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.
She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advanced for their help.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her business,

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is 34 years old. She is married with four children aged between six and fourteen. With the loan, she would like to buy more milk, soda and sugar to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more soda, milk and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon is 49 years old. He sells fruits and has been in the business for the past 19 years. With the loan, he would like to buy more oranges, passion fruits and pineapples to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay for the children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy more fruits to sell.

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.en: Jeanne is 31 years old. She is married with one child. With the loan, she would like to buy more fruits to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate the house.

loans.use: to buy more fruits to sell.

loans.name: Bindu

texts.en:
33-year-old Bindu, lives and works in Buchanan, the capital city of Grand Bassa County which is located by the sea. It is well known for its beaches and delicious fish. Many logging companies are also based in the city. Residents of the city love eating fufu, a cassava based dough typically eaten with soup or sauce. Most people in the city are Bassa speakers, one of the indigenous languages of Liberia. Bindu lives with her husband and three children who are between the ages of 14 and 3, two of them are currently attending school. Bindu did not go to school. She stated that she is good at taking down day to day records to keep information about her net income. She has been selling pepper, oil, rice, salt, etc. for the past 18 years at the local market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more inventory for her business. She likes her business because it helps to support her home. She hopes to one day own a house.
She wants to thank the Kiva lenders in advanced for their help.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her business.

loans.name: Segundo Uldarico

texts.es:
Segundo es un hombre de 62 años, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, en el distrito de Ocoña con su esposa y sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su deseo por superarse, Segundo pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de agricultura que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus hijos y amigos, y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Segundo se dedica a la agricultura, el cuenta con una pequeña parcela donde cultiva frejoles, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana realizando labores de campo y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Segundo se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de la compra de abono y pago de mano de obra para la cosecha de su cultivo, así pues Segundo seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Segundo, 62, lives in the city of Camaná, in the district of Ocoña, with his wife and two children, who he loves and are his main motivation in life.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who makes every effort, along with his wife, to provide for his family.  Thanks to his desire to get ahead, Segundo was able to get a technical farming degree and in his free time he enjoys playing soccer with his children and friends.  Sometimes he makes a delicious Arroz Chaufa (fried rice) to share with famiy.

On his own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Segundo works in agriculture and has a small patch of land where he grows beans.  He works every day, around ten hours, on his field chores from the early morning hours.  He is content and believes things are going well for him because of his experience and kindness to others.

Segundo is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to you he will be able to buy fertilizer and hire workers at crop harvest time.  This will allow Segundo to continue working and striving toward his goal of seeing his children become good professionals.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay for crop harvest.

loans.name: Gavi Yensi

texts.es:
Gavi es una mujer de 36 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, Gavi no pudo culminar sus estudios secundarios y eso la imposibilito de poder estudiar una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por la orilla de una playa cercana a su hogar.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Gavi trabaja como obrera de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, ella realiza labores de sembrado, abono, cosecha y otros, Gavi trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Gavi se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea tarrajear y pintar su hogar, de esta manera Gavi tendrá un lugar adecuado para vivir, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener un buen trabaja que le ayude a mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Gavi, 36, is single and lives in the city of Camaná.  She is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who makes every effort to get ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work from a very early age to help her parents, Gavi was unable to finish her secondary education.  This meant she could not get a professional degree.  In her free time she enjoys taking walks along the beach near her home.

On her own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Gavi works as a hired hand on a farm in her city.  She carries out tasks such as planting, fertilizing, harvesting, etc.  She works an average eight hours a day, every day, and believes work is going well for her because of her kindness to others.

Gavi is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your help she will be able to renovate her house.  She wants to cover the walls and paint them to make the home an adequate living space.  This will allow her to continue working and striving toward her goal of leading a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To renovate her house.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: Roxana, tiene la edad  de 47 años, está en unión libre, vive con sus hijos y esposo  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y abonos orgánicos, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, pagar estudios de sus hijos y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Roxana is 47 years old. She is in a common law marriage and lives with her children and spouse, who are her main priority. With the loan, she intends to buy fertilizer and organic fertilizer, fungicides and also pay for labor to help with the coffee crop.  She will also buy some seedlings to do some re-planting when the rains start to increase plant density by area as well as take advantage of the good soil fertility and weather conditions that favor coffee growing. With these improvements she hopes to obtain a little profit. This will improve her family's quality of life, pay for her children's education and also she will invest a little more in the planting area and reach some goals. This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hasn't had any previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with more ease of payment and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: pay for help with the coffee crop.

loans.name: Jeannette

texts.es: Jeannette, tiene la edad  de 23 años, está soltera, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de madera y materiales de construcción y pagar mano de obra en la reparación a la vivienda, y de esta manera eliminar algunas entradas de agua a la vivienda en el periodo de lluvia que ya casi inicia y así poderle ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Con esta compra pretende hacer una mejora de buena calidad a su casa y que su familia mejoré su calidad de vida y aprovechar precios bajos en algunos materiales y que son de buena calidad. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jeanette is 23 years old. She is single and lives with her parents and brothers who are older. With her loan, she intends to buy wood and construction materials and to pay for the labor to repair her house and, in this way, eliminate some leaks that occur during the rainy season that is about to start and offer a better quality of life to her family. With this purchase, she intends to provide a good quality improvement to her house and her family will improve their quality of life and she will take advantage of low prices on some materials that are of good quality. This is the first loan she has received from Fudecosur. She has not had other loans previously from state banks but Fudecosur has provided a loan with greater ease and the interest rate is much lower.

loans.use: to improve her house.

loans.name: Abad

texts.es:
Abad tiene 49 años de edad, es un padre muy cariñoso y sobre todo se esfuerza mucho para poder sacar a su hija adelante, y es por ello que abad trabaja como cerrajero, y gracias a este oficio puede solventar los gastos de su hogar. Día a Día Abad le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 3 clientes diariamente ya que depende del tipo de estructura y del tamaño que le piden sus clientes.

Abad está muy agradecido por el apoyo que le brindan los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá pagar la matrícula y algunas mensualidades del instituto de su hija, de esta manera Abad podrá brindarle una mejor educación a su hija y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hija y tener un negocio más grande”.
texts.en:
Abad, 49, is a loving father who works very hard to provide for his daughter.  He works as a locksmith to earn a living to cover household expenses.  Every day Abad spends around nine hours working and tendind to an average three customers a day, depending on the type and size of structure being requested of him.

Abad is very grateful for the support he receives from Kiva lenders because thanks to you he will be able to pay for registration fees and tuition for his daughter's education.  This will allow Abad to give his daughter the best education he can while he continues working toward his goal of "Giving his daughter professional training and running a larger business".

loans.use: To pay for his daughter's registration fees and tuition.

loans.name: Giner

texts.es: Giner, tiene la edad  de 44 años, está casado pero vive solo. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas personales.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Giner is 44 years old. He is married but he lives alone. With his loan, he intends to buy fertilizer, fungicide and to pay for labor costs to help with the coffee. He will also buy some seedlings to do some re-planting when the rains begin in order to increase the density of plants by area. and take advantage of the good soil fertility and weather conditions that favor coffee growing. With these improvements to the crop he hopes obtain a little profit. This will help him improve his quality of life and also invest a little more in the planting area and achieve some personal goals. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had any previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with more ease of payment and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to plant coffee.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose tiene 58 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad de clima calido y acogedor, asimismo posee atractivos turísticos hermosos y sus pobladores son personas de carácter alegre y amable. Jose vie al lado de su esposa y juntos tienen 4 hijos, los cuales ya son mayores de edad y por los cuales ha luchado de manera incansable para convertirlos en personas de bien. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos solo pudo estudiar hasta el cuarto de primaria pero le hubiera gustado tener una carrera universitaria especialmente estudiar ingeniería agrónoma.

Día a día Jose trabaja como agricultor, actualmente ha sembrado Camu Camu, el cual es un fruto originario de la selva peruana y poseedor de muchas propiedades curativas, especialmente para la diabetes, Jose trabaja en su cultivo alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede sacar adelante con mucho esfuerzo a su familia; Jose cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de progresar.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le están brindando el podrá comprar abono, fertilizantes y poder dar mantenimiento, regadío para su cultivo, así el podrá tener una buena cosecha y podrá mejorar sus ingresos  y de esta manera el podrá seguir trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener más hectáreas para sembrar y mejorar su calidad de vida”.
texts.en:
Jose is 58 years old. He lives in the city of Pucallpa, a city with a warm and welcoming climate. At the same time, it has beautiful tourist attractions and its residents are people of a happy and friendly character. Jose lives with his wife and together they have four children who are adults and for whom they have fought tirelessly to ensure they become good people. Due to their small economic resources, he was only able to study up to the fourth year of primary school but he would have liked to have a university career especially to study agricultural engineering.

Day after day, Jose works as a farmer. Currently he has planted Camu Camu which is a native fruit of the Peruvian jungle and has many healing properties, especially for diabetes. Jose works in his crops for around eight hours a day and with the fruit of his labor he can get his family ahead with much effort. Jose believes that he is moving forward because he is responsible and, above all, because he has a lot of desire to progress.

Jose is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to the help they are providing, he will be able to buy organic and chemical fertilizers and be able to provide maintenance and irrigation to his crops. So he will be able to have a good harvest and be able to improve his income and, in this way, he will be able to keep working to realize his greatest dream: "To have more hectares to sow and improve his quality of life."

loans.use: to purchase organic and chemical fertilizers, and maintenance, among other things.

loans.name: Jeison

texts.es: Jeison, tiene la edad  de 29 años, está unión libre, vive con sus hijos y esposa, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de equipos y herramientas para realizar trabajos de albañil, las cuales le facilitará la elaboración del trabajo y con mejores acabados y así poder aumentar la cantidad del trabajo y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido en capacitaciones y poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de herramientas y otras productos, y  también lograr un mejor acabado a los trabajos realizados. Con esta compra pretende aumentar la demanda y con diseños más variados y así cumplir con los contratos a corto plazo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jeison is 29 years old. He is in a common law marriage and lives with his children and wife. They are his main priority. With the loan, he intends to buy equipment and tools to do masonry work. This will make it easier to do his work with better finishings, thus increasing the amount of work and taking advantage of the knowledge he has acquired in trainings. This will make him able to have the income to keep investing in buying tools and other products and do better finishings on the work he has done. With this purchase, he intends to increase demand with more varied designs, finishing orders in a short time. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had any loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with more ease of payment and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to do wood preparation

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis Antonio, tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de equipo para la preparación de madera para hacer muebles, la cual le facilitará la elaboración de madera y así poder aumentar la cantidad de muebles realizados y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido en capacitaciones y poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de madera y otras productos, y  también lograr un mejor acabado a los muebles fabricados, además de aumentar la cantidad y calidad de piezas. Con esta compra pretende hacer más nubles y con diseños más variados y así cumplir con los pedidos a corto plazo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Luis Antonio is 20 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and brothers, who are older.
